title: 656: AMAZON READY TO DEPLOY BITCOIN PAYMENTS?!! BTC BLAST THROUGH $44K, HITTING HIGHEST PRICE SINCE MAY!!
description:
Amazon denied reports it will accept Bitcoin payments soon, but seemingly, it’s only a matter of time before the tech giants embrace the token economy.

The question still remains: If and when the tech giants do commit, what impact will they have on the cryptocurrency and blockchain industry?

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
